title: Gilded Cage
description: Poetry - Words of Pleasure, Pain, Madness and LustWelcome…  Obsessive Cravings…Uncontrollable Lust Journey to a Place of Madness and Trust Deliciously Dark…Destructively Tragic Sprinkle Some Pain…A Dash of Magic  It’s the Darkness of Emotion that Sheds Light Sets Your Mind Free, and Your Soul Takes Flight Come to the World of the Gilded Cage Release Your Fury…Let Loose Your Rage.
author: Alisa Anderson
